page.title: 15EDUCATION (CONT)
page.content: Our school janitor is also our Dinner Lady although she does not cook. Due to the distance involved, no child goes home for dinner. One third bring a packed lunch while the other two thirds have school meals. These are made in Locharbriggs Primary and brought to us by taxi. The children have the opportunity to take part in various school clubs-Computer, Country Dance, Keep Fit, Tennis and Recorder. The school has an active, well supported P.T.A. and several parents help out with extra-curricular activities such as Woodwork, Sewing and Football.
